Question: In the 2017 movie 'The Mummy', what was the connection between Brendan Fraser and the proposed project 'The Mummy: Rise of the Aztecs'?
Options:
A. Brendan Fraser directed 'The Mummy: Rise of the Aztecs'.
B. Brendan Fraser was supposedly on board for 'The Mummy: Rise of the Aztecs'.
C. Brendan Fraser starred in 'The Mummy: Rise of the Aztecs'.
D. Brendan Fraser wrote the script for 'The Mummy: Rise of the Aztecs'.
